alert.note: Alert for Madison; Tensas (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 03 at 2:23AM CDT until April 03 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Tensas Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Eastern Madison Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Warren County in west central Mississippi... Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Southwestern Hinds County in central Mississippi... South central Issaquena County in west central Mississippi... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 222 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Somerset, or 16 miles south of Tallulah, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Vicksburg, Yokena and Le Tourneau around 245 AM CDT. Rocky Springs around 255 AM CDT. Reganton and Newman around 300 AM CDT. Utica around 310 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Mound and Delta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
